question: {name} has {n} jars of {item} in her {location}. Each jar of {item} can decorate {m} {food}s. {name} wants to bake enough {food}s to use up all of her {item}. {name} has {count} {container}s, each can hold {k} {food}s. After using all her {item} to bake {food}s and putting them in {container}s, how many empty {container}s will {name} be left with?
